document_data.name: Unshey
document_data.mainbody: '''Unshey''' was a [[cleric]] and author who resided on the [[Sword Coast]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Sometime in the [[1368 DR|Year of the Banner, 1368 DR]], Unshey encountered an [[ogre]] while traveling along the [[Coast Way]]. In exchange for her life, she offered the the creature a signed copy of her book, the ''[[History of Tethyr (book)|History of Tethyr]]''. Unfortunately, the ogre had a particular fetish for wearing girdles and accepted nothing less than her [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] belt, ''[[Elves' Bane]]''.

Escaping with her life, Unshey made her way north to the [[Friendly Arm Inn]] to seek refuge.
